
# quickshare
A toy project for sharing Markdown via URL.

# How to use
Just go to: [https://carlosmpv.github.io/quickshare](https://carlosmpv.github.io/quickshare) and start typing. Press `esc` to view the rendered content. Copy the URL to share with others.

# Disclaimer
- Content is limited to how big an URL can be.
- ⚠️ Content may not be safe since there is no validation on the generated content! ⚠️

# [Checkout this sample](https://carlosmpv.github.io/quickshare/?)
